divs: Sighting DetailsBright orange round starlike object observed in the north west at about 40 degrees. Object hovered then moved at a medium speed to 90 degres in a south west direction, then dissapeared. No clouds, no sound, no trails, no landing. No other aircraft observed in area. Aircraft are rare in this area.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Dahlonega
There were no other sightings in Dahlonega on or around September 7th 2013
